rawResults.name: MicrobatchCollector + Kafka (Batch Send)
rawResults.notes: Submitted: 91,669,181 events; Sent to Kafka: 90,894,308 events; Batches sent: 773; Avg batch size: 117586.4; Avg Kafka batch time: 18.171 ms; Kafka throughput: 8,545,911 events/sec; Best config: batch=30000000, interval=30000000Âµs
